posts.title: Moo.do has become Legend!
posts.contents:
Moo.do is now known as Legend! Check out the new website and the announcement.

We will continue to update Moo.do in parity with Legend for a while, but we encourage everyone to switch over to Legend at your earliest convenience. The mobile apps and extensions will be renamed to Legend in the coming weeks, so donâ€™t be surprised if your Moo.do app suddenly has a new name!
